content.data:
[Y]Design Retrospective
[W]What classic games still teach.
[c][m.]
[W]Strong games communicate rules
[W]instantly and reward learning patterns
[W]over luck.
[W]Tight constraints often produced very
[W]readable design decisions.
[c][m.]
[G]- Clarity first.
[G]- Feedback first.
[G]- Rhythm first.
[m][m-]
[Y]WRAP UP
[C]Good design remains good long after
[C]hardware shifts.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
